website_summaries.verdict: Though the Sanyo SCP-200 is a simple, functional cell phone that will please beginner users, more-demanding customers will be disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: So keep and a waste of money
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are a joke. I bought them to use for a kid consignment sale so thank God I’m not actually nedeeding them in my own closet. But just hanging clothing on them once’s the black coating is falling off all over my house. So keep and a waste of money. If I didn’t need them for this weekend I would have returned them. Complete trash.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Great price for the quantity
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are very light weight. They are a great price for the quantity. I bought them to use as a consignment sale, not everyday use. They are best to use for light weight clothing. Again, you can't beat the price for the quantity. I didn't want to pay a lot for hangers that I was using for a consignment sale and yard sale. For what I use them for, I will be buying again.
customer_reviews.author: Denise Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Truth
customer_reviews.text: Space savers. Great value $$. Not very durable and a lot of bad ones.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica D

customer_reviews.title: Recommended
customer_reviews.text: I really like this hangers. I chose the white one. IS PERFECT FOR THE PRICE ..
customer_reviews.author: daniilsa soto

customer_reviews.title: Great for consigning.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for consigning. Nothing spectacular or awful about them, they did the job fine.
customer_reviews.author: Hoarder

customer_reviews.title: Ok for lightweight garments only.
customer_reviews.text: Not very sturdy hangers. They're ok for lightweight blouses or perhaps lightweight dresses but they told in & bend if you try to hang Anything heavier such as denim.
customer_reviews.author: Just Inga

customer_reviews.title: Super thin but you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Super thin but you get what you pay for i guess. I feel like basic metal hangers shouldn't cost much anyway but apparently I'm wrong. So I got this cheap pack and they work as long as you're not trying to hang a jacket or a good thick hoodie.55
customer_reviews.author: Brittannica

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for hanging shirts, bloused and tee shits.
customer_reviews.text: just what I was liking for to redo my wife's closet. We now have all of her cloths seasonally separated, some stored, the rest coordinated like the clothing storeblouses organised and
customer_reviews.author: Robert C. Massey

customer_reviews.title: Great buy. I got these to hang my clothes ...
customer_reviews.text: Great buy. I got these to hang my clothes that I sell at consignment stores. They require their items hung and plastic hangers are costly. This was a great find.

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The only problem is they stick together and that makes them sharp. Sometimes they scratch clothing.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight clothing only!
customer_reviews.text: If you have very lightweight clothing these will work wonders. But nothing with any weight and you definitely can't hang any type of pants on it.

customer_reviews.title: Not the best product around, wouldn't buy them again

customer_reviews.title: Horrible cheap quality
customer_reviews.text: These are horrible hangers. So cheap in quality and very thin and flimsy. Don’t waste your money on this junk product. I am very unsatisfied.

customer_reviews.title: only place i could find these
customer_reviews.text: looked many times online and this is only place I found them. Exactly what I wanted. light weight and thin. Don't take up space in closet and add a lot of weight to my rack. shipped fast and perfect. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: mary edwards

customer_reviews.title: Wire is a bit light weight
customer_reviews.text: Hangers were nice, but a little light. Didn't realize, but the gauge was posted in the ad. Think I'll pay for heavier ones next time, but these will do in the meantime!

customer_reviews.title: Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These work for my husbands shirts. He likes to pull them off and the ones he had don't slide off easily.

customer_reviews.title: very lightweight
customer_reviews.text: they weren't as sturdy as I'd expected, bend very easily even on lightweight shirts. didn't think I'd need a heavy duty hanger for t-shirts

customer_reviews.title: Sendinga message.
customer_reviews.text: I sent them all to Kay Ivey, Governor of Alabama. I do hope she liked them (and got my message).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Some of the hangers stick together and when they are ...
customer_reviews.text: Some of the hangers stick together and when they are pulled apart, the coating has bumps that snag the clothes.

customer_reviews.title: Value
customer_reviews.text: Fast shipping, small package and excellent price! I consign childrens clothing and they were perfect!

customer_reviews.title: Value

customer_reviews.title: Too thin !!

customer_reviews.title: Good for the Money!

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality

customer_reviews.title: Got What I Ordered
customer_reviews.text: Quality for Price are about what you expect, a little thinner and flimsier than what I expected, but not too much! Deff gets the job done.

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The wire used for these hangers is such fine gauge that they bend if any but light clothing is placed on them. I am disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: Great

customer_reviews.title: As described

customer_reviews.text: Love these! They are exactly what I was looking for. They are nice sturdy hangers and yet still thin.

customer_reviews.title: Will buy again
customer_reviews.text: I use these for kids consignment sales and work perfectly for what I need.

customer_reviews.title: These are very flimsy. The pro is that they ...
customer_reviews.text: These are very flimsy. The pro is that they can save space in your closet but they are extremely flimsy, perhaps the thinnest hangers I have ever seen in my life.
customer_reviews.author: Kabir Uddin

customer_reviews.title: Flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Won't hardly hold a T shirt don't wast your money
customer_reviews.author: Cecil Booth

customer_reviews.title: Too thin, too wide.
customer_reviews.text: Too thin, also wider than regular hangers. I wish I had my money back.
customer_reviews.author: ncdowdy

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Hangers arrived late, almost too late for what we needed them. Very flimsy and low quality as well.
customer_reviews.author: Marc Appell

customer_reviews.title: Black Wire Hangers 18" Standard by Homeneeds
customer_reviews.text: These hangers are exactly like the white ones you would get from a dry cleaner. These are perfect for my dress shirts as they keep the collar up and fit the shirt widthwise from shoulder to shoulder. I read some review in which they said the black coating was sticking the hangers together...I did not experience this, all 50 hangers were flawless with no imperfections. I think they are painted just like the white ones you get from a dry cleaner. No chipping, no snagging, no breaking and absolutely perfect and look great. The black color gives your closet a more elegant look.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Z

customer_reviews.title: Great, within limits
customer_reviews.text: These are exactly the same as the hangers I get from the cleaners. They’d very light weight and take up almost no space, and they are perfect for what they’re designed for—shirts or a windbreaker. And they’re 2” wider than some hangers, so clothes don’t slide off. If you’re wanting to hang jeans or jackets, these will not do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbzz

customer_reviews.title: Very light, bad paint job.
customer_reviews.text: They aren't great. If they were thicker wire (like twice as thick). and better painted, they'd be perfect. But I didn't expect much. My only real concern is paint flaking off. It hasn't happened yet, but they're cheap, so I'm watching for it. I'd have happily paid the same price for 50 higher quality hangers!
customer_reviews.author: Exaybachay

customer_reviews.title: Standard Hangers
customer_reviews.text: They're your standard wire hangers. They're brand new and come packaged nicely in a way so they won't tangle as you're taking them out. There was no extra packing material in the box however. The hangers will end if you're not paying attention, so they are not thicker than normal wire hangers, but they're not so thin that your clothing will bend them. I got the 200 pack because I needed hangers to place kids clothes on for consignment. These worked perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: T.T.

customer_reviews.title: Not very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: When I ordered these hangers I expected them to be pretty sturdy, however they are not. For lightweight shirts these hangers work perfect but I tried to put a pair of khaki pants on the hangers and they immediately flexed and didn't even attempt to hold their shape. So dont expect to put coats, Jean's or anything with any type of weight on these hangers
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: These are thin like the ones I used to get from dry cleaner. They work great for dress shirt and golf shirts. As others have stated they are not heavy enough for sweater or hoodies. Good price and look nice .
customer_reviews.author: Cam's Dad

customer_reviews.title: Don’t Buy
customer_reviews.text: I was very disappointed in the quality of these hangers. I am a very small person and these hangers are not strong enough to support the weight of a pair of capris without extreme bowing. They work great on the lightest of shirts and that’s it. A sturdier hanger of about twice the wire diameter would be appreciated.
customer_reviews.author: Angela Sawyer

customer_reviews.title: Worked perfectly for our needs
customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a clothing swap. Not super high quality, but worked perfectly for our needs, and they were bendy enough to hold tank tops and skirts. Came well packaged, too, which we were able to restore for easy storage and the next swap. I wouldn't buy them for everyday use, as I think they might break more quickly than heavier hangers.
customer_reviews.author: Smizic

customer_reviews.title: Black Wire Hangers
customer_reviews.text: I haven't tried these hangers yet. I have received these hangers, I will say from the look & feel of these hangers they seem worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Franko

customer_reviews.title: Nada
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived all broken so there was nothing in which to send them back. I forgot how slippery these things are - everything I put on them fell off on the floor. I will be donating them to the charity shop with my used clothes.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine Brennan

customer_reviews.title: Nice hangers
customer_reviews.text: What can you really say about a clothes hanger it did its job it was packaged nicely I use them and I'm happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Nitescard

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't use these for my clothes.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for a consignment sale. Several of them were stuck together causing the coating to come off and leaving very rough edges. I wouldn't use these on my own clothes, but they were okay for consignment.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Multi Use Hangers
customer_reviews.text: Thin and flimsy. Would make a good wire hanger to get into your car for the keys you left in your locked car. Lots of other other good uses too, I'm sure. These hangers left ME hung out to dry.
customer_reviews.author: Juke Joint Jack’s

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great purchase if you need lots of hangers. Sturdy for the type of hanger it is
customer_reviews.author: Brett

customer_reviews.title: Solid choice for space-consious closets
customer_reviews.text: I needed thinner hangers and these wire hangers helped reduce the bulk of my older wooden ones. They have plenty of strength and I have no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy L Holmes

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: At 18 inches it holds those t-shirts with large necks.
customer_reviews.author: john h.

customer_reviews.title: Just what we needed
customer_reviews.text: Perfect justvwhst we needed. Moved from the other coast and we needed 300 hangers. This did thevtrick

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for making more room in the closet. Plastic hangers take up more space when you have a packed closet. These are great and the price was right
customer_reviews.author: Julie L

customer_reviews.title: Hangers
customer_reviews.text: These are not standard. They are for LARGE shirts. I'm sure they work well for large shirts but not for standard size.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie R. Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: sturdy hanger for shirts and blouses
customer_reviews.text: Works great for light weight goods, takes up very little space
customer_reviews.author: Peggy McKelvey

customer_reviews.title: Always check the size!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as advertised and arrived quickly but BEWARE - these are the 18" size, NOT the standard 15.5". I ended up not being able to use them because they would have stretched my clothes out. I had to reorder the right size.
customer_reviews.author: CatsinQ

customer_reviews.title: Great for Making Wreaths
customer_reviews.text: I used these to make Christmas wreaths. They are thin enough to be easily molded and shaped and I have enough to last several years.
customer_reviews.author: Melicon

customer_reviews.title: So flimsy.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these wouls be like the wire ones dry cleaners use but they are so flimsy.
customer_reviews.author: Jrc

customer_reviews.title: LIGHT WEIGHT
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to use for a garage sale. They worked well for light weight items like shirts, but bended easily for heavier items like pants and jeans.

customer_reviews.title: very useful little tiny handgers
customer_reviews.text: very useful little tiny handgers!i was looking for this in stores,but hard to find it.i like it ,i just use it to hang my dress and some thin clothes.i have a small wardrobe but i have a lot of dress,it is a perfect shape tha i need!

customer_reviews.title: If your just going to use them for thin shirts ...
customer_reviews.text: If your just going to use them for thin shirts or blouses they are ok. They are far too flimsy for anything else.

customer_reviews.title: Not Durable
customer_reviews.text: Too lightweight to hold anything. Skip it, unless you are hanging doll clothes.

customer_reviews.text: Bought them for a garage sale. They worked really well for that

customer_reviews.text: Used to prep clothing for consignment sale. Sturdy, good value for cost
